String.string: Head northwest, and you'll find the grellem spires.
Break the {@creature:45#7003#grellem spires} in the northwestern swamp of the {@Rgn:45003$$Vale of the Reaper} and collect shards.
Kill the {@creature:45#6001#argonomorph tuwangi frogmaster} in the far northwest of the {@Rgn:45003$$Vale of the Reaper}.
Deliver the shards to {@LinkCreature:245#1013$$Chaxanaz} at {@Rgn:45007$$Field Base Tenacity}.
